title: Honie (A)
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child psychology
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Self-perception

description: Episode of Series "I myself". Honie has an Aboriginal mother and an English father and lives in an inner suburb of a large Australian city. The film provides insights into her view of her own identity. An examination of her experiences within school, home and community leads to an awareness of aspects of Aboriginal culture important to Honie and her family.
